resources.string:
Terms & Conditions.
1 By using Delicious Deck, you agree to follow these terms. 2 Orders are non-refundable once prepared. 3 Prices and availability are subject to change. 4 Customers must provide accurate contact and delivery details. 5 We reserve the right to cancel or refuse orders at our discretion. 6 Users must not engage in fraudulent activities on the platform. 7 We collect necessary data for order processing and customer service. 8 These terms may be updated at any time, with notice provided in-app.
